Class AbstractOptionHandler

java.lang.Object
  moa.AbstractMOAObject
      moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, MOAObject, OptionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractClassifier, AbstractClusterer, AbstractStreamFilter, AbstractTask, AgrawalGenerator, ArffFileStream, BinaryTreeNumericAttributeClassObserver, ClusteringStream, ConceptDriftRealStream, ConceptDriftStream, DDM, EDDM, EWMAClassificationPerformanceEvaluator, FadingFactorClassificationPerformanceEvaluator, FilteredStream, GaussianNumericAttributeClassObserver, GiniSplitCriterion, GreenwaldKhannaNumericAttributeClassObserver, HyperplaneGenerator, InfoGainSplitCriterion, LEDGenerator, MetaMultilabelGenerator, NominalAttributeClassObserver, NullAttributeClassObserver, RandomRBFGenerator, RandomTreeGenerator, SEAGenerator, STAGGERGenerator, VFMLNumericAttributeClassObserver, WaveformGenerator, WindowClassificationPerformanceEvaluator, WindowRegressionPerformanceEvaluator
public abstract class AbstractOptionHandler
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements OptionHandler

Abstract Option Handler. All classes that have options in MOA extend this class.

Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)

prepareForUseImpl

protected abstract void prepareForUseImpl(TaskMonitor monitor,
                                          ObjectRepository repository)
This method describes the implementation of how to prepare this object for use. All classes that extends this class have to implement prepareForUseImpl and not prepareForUse since prepareForUse calls prepareForUseImpl.

Parameters:
monitor - the TaskMonitor to use
repository - the ObjectRepository to use
